item.title: Three ways to log S3 Bucket Activities
item.description: Enable Server Access Logging for an S3 Bucket. It is one of the S3 bucket properties. You just need to select a target bucket and prefix to complete the setup. The details are available here: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/user-guide/server-access-logging.html Pros: less infrastructure no code involved easy to search log for a specific bucket. Cons: the target bucket must be in public ip which is a deal breaker sometimes. no UI.
